EN.SUBJECT: Registration with Pebbles Community
EN.TEXT1: Thank you for signing up to Pebbles Community! We are glad you are joining us.
EN.TEXT2: Our community is waiting for you to explore, find new connections and learn new things.
EN.TEXT3: We are here to support your life in Japan and learning Japanese so check out all 4 areas of the community!
EN.QUESTION: If you have any questions or comments, feel free to reply to this email.

JA.SUBJECT: Pebbles Communityを登録ずみ
JA.TEXT1: 日本語Thank you for signing up to Pebbles Community! We are glad you are joining us.
JA.TEXT2: 日本語Our community is waiting for you to explore, find new connections and learn new things.
JA.TEXT3: 日本語We are here to support your life in Japan and learning Japanese so check out all 4 areas of the community!
JA.QUESTION: 質問やコメントがありましたら、ご気楽にこのメールをそのまま返信してください。
JA.SIGNOFF: コミュニティーで会いましょうね！

EN.SUBJECT: Password reset
EN.BODY: Here is your password reset link. Click on it and it will take you to reset your password

JA.SUBJECT: Jap Password reset
JA.BODY: Jap Here is your password reset link. Click on it and it will take you to reset your password
